creator: gregor@apache.org
text:
now that BXE supports the kupu drawers, it makes sense to consolidate the popup
code, and use the drawers in BXE too.

i'm not familiar with kupu drawers. do they offer any advantages over the
current solution? if so, i'd rather try and improve the generic usecases than
re-add an alternate mechanism again. please comment if you have warm feelings
towards kupu drawers, whatever they may be.
creator: nettings@apache.org
